item.title: PO and technical debt
item.description: Nice read: http://www.agileadvice.com/2015/10/24/howtoapplyagile/question-product-owner-and-technical-debt/ As a product owner, what are the best ways to record technical debt and what are some approaches to prioritizing that work amid the continuous delivery of working software?
